entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20 with temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 20 with temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
